meanings: an air-raided city, a city which has suffered from bombing

examples.korean: There was an incident of radiation exposure (to people) at the nuclear power plant. 발음듣기 원자력 발전소에서 방사능 피폭 사고가 발생했다 Neungyule
examples.english: There was an incident of radiation exposure (to people) at the nuclear power plant. 발음

examples.korean: Of course, there is still a lot to deal with, like radiation exposure and reconstruction of the homes and lives that were lost. 발음듣기 물론 아직도 방사능 노출(피폭)에 대비하고, 허물어진 집과 생활 터전을 다시 일으켜 세우는 등 처리해야 할 일이 많다. Neungyule
examples.english: Of course, there is still a lot to deal with, like radiation exposure and reconstruction of the homes and lives that were lost. 발음

examples.korean: Episode 66, titled "Marge Gets a Job," features scientists Marie Curie and Pierre Curie dying of radiation poisoning, while characters joke about a nuclear meltdown in Episode 346, titled "On a Clear Day I Can’t See My Sister." 발음듣기 "마지가 취직하다"라는 제목의 제66화는 방사선 피폭으로 죽는 과학자들인 마리 퀴리와 피에르 퀴리를 다루는 반면, "나의 누이를 볼 수 없는 맑은 날"이라는 제목의 제346화에서 인물들은 원자로의 멜트다운에 대해 농담을 한다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: Episode 66, titled "Marge Gets a Job," features scientists Marie Curie and Pierre Curie dying of radiation poisoning, while characters joke about a nuclear meltdown in Episode 346, titled "On a Clear Day I Can’t See My Sister." 발음

examples.korean: They play sad music after a bomb. 발음듣기 그들은 피폭 후에 슬픈 음악을 연주한다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. cielcine(ciel****) Web Collection
